desc:
35% boost to all parameters of Fire types, damage taken boosts BB gauge & boosts Fire elemental damage
Guild Raid: 5% boost to all parameters of Fire types & 5% damage reduction from Earth Element types

dictionary.lore: Formed with a Pyre Orb as its nucleus, this artifact is warm to the touch. Thanks to trial and (explosive) error, Noel has managed to improve the compression ratios, allowing him to solidify elemental essence around a stable base.

name: Pyrespark Orb
